summary: A beautiful large but not huge estate that has everything you need as a collector & dragonborn. It gives off a calm pleasent atmosphere of nature and harmory with a good decorated style.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee474/GameByte_sa/creedhillsestate.png[/IMG][/center]
[center]
[center][b]SUPPORT FOR THIS MOD HAS ENDED![/b][/center]
=====================================================================================================================================[/center]
[center][b]*** CREED HILLS ESTATE ***[/b][/center]
[center]=====================================================================================================================================[/center]
[center][youtube]NLBgagFRB5k[/youtube][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** DESCRIPTION **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
A beautiful large but not huge estate that has everything you need as a collector & dragonborn. It gives off a calm pleasent atmosphere of nature and harmory with a good decorated style.

[b]PLEASE NOTE: Skyrim Patch 1.5.26 is required.[/b]

MY OTHER MODS:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14590]Nirn Falls Manor[/url]
RECOMMENDED MODS:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/url] - With this mod mannequins wont wonder around anymore and it will fix any other problem you have with mannequins. Please endorse this mod as Bethesda could not even post an update for this!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8143]Alternatives - Whiterun[/url] By ZayLa - Download this to get the exact look of Creed Hills Estate in the pictures.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370]Spouses Can Live Everywhere[/url] - With this mod you can move your spouses to live with in any custom house mod.
TRANSLATIONS
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17113]Creed Hills Estate Czech[/url]

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** CONTENTS OF THE PLAYER HOME **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
6 Storage Chests + 1 Master Chest
7 mannequins
6 Large Display Cases
6 Dagger Display Cases
2 Unscripted Display Cases
4 Shield & Weapon Plaques
10 Weapon Plaques
2 Weapon Racks (4 on each)
2 Large Bookshelves
2 Small Bookshelves
2 Safes
5 Strongboxes
Basement
Secret Room
Enchanting Table with satchel
Alchemy Table With Satchel
Cooking Pot
Forge & Workbench
Grindstone
Smelter & Tanning Rack
Master Bedroom
Double Bedroom for Followers
Navmesh Everywhere

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** NOTES **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
If there are any bugs please inform me so I can fix em’ straight away. All the player storage works, no re-spawns.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** KNOWN BUGS/ISSUES **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
* None so far

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** INSTALLATION **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Take the Creed Hills Estate plugin mod and place it into the DATA folder (The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data). Then remember to tick it under DATA FILES in the launcher.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** UNINSTALLATION **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Delete the plugin file from the DATA folder. Before you remove the plugin file, be sure to remove all your items from the player home or else you will lose all the items stored in the player home. 

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** VERSION HISTORY **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
v 0.9.9 
- Initial Release

v 1.0.0 
- Added 2 Shield Plaques in secret room
        - Added Fountain Water Sounds
        - Added Water to fountains
        - Added lights by pool
        - Changed lighting
        - Changed door sounds
        - Changed Nightingale Banners
        - Fixed Ceiling Vines
        - Fixed Mannequin in secret room
        - Removed Daedric sword displays

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** F.A.Q **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[b]Q: Will my stuff disappear if I place them in the storage available?[/b]
A: No your stuff will stay there forever, there are no re-spawns.

[b]Q: Will this mod conflict with any other mods?[/b]
A: It could conflict with mods that are in the same location but otherwise it should not conflict with any other mods.

[b]Q: Will there be more features added to this mod?[/b]
A: Yes, more people are requesting I add this or that to make the mod perfect, so eventually I will.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][b]** CREDITS **[/b][/center]
[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center]Created By: Gh0zt_sa – Gh0zt W0rkz[/center]

[center]________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]Endorse if you enjoy :)[/center]
